analysis.description:
token (/unique_chucks/29/0x254cc4c26f769317ce199e368d0b4d604c9ca704.sol#135-138) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/29/0x254cc4c26f769317ce199e368d0b4d604c9ca704.sol#136-138)

Reentrancy in SendTokensContract.withdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/29/0x254cc4c26f769317ce199e368d0b4d604c9ca704.sol#177-188):
	External calls:
	- tokenReward.transfer(msg.sender,bals[msg.sender]) (/unique_chucks/29/0x254cc4c26f769317ce199e368d0b4d604c9ca704.sol#183-185)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bals (/unique_chucks/29/0x254cc4c26f769317ce199e368d0b4d604c9ca704.sol#187-188)

RWSC.Airdrop (/unique_chucks/29/0x254cc4c26f769317ce199e368d0b4d604c9ca704.sol#205-209) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_addresses[i],amount) (/unique_chucks/29/0x254cc4c26f769317ce199e368d0b4d604c9ca704.sol)

RWSC.Airdrop has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(_addresses[i],amount) (/unique_chucks/29/0x254cc4c26f769317ce199e368d0b4d604c9ca704.sol)
